timeline.message:
Enable NullOptional error prone check

We also upgrade error prone to v2.4.0, because NullOptional was added in
v2.4.0.

timeline.body:
The call with `null` (as it used to be) should fail with NPE.
I hope https://github.com/prestosql/presto/issues/4293 would catch this.
timeline.bodyText:

I hope #4293 would catch this.
